-- DaoProducts_D4_Delete -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 DELETE FROM [Products]
WHERE AND [ProductID] = @ProductIDAND [ProductID] IS NULL AND [ProductName] = @ProductNameAND [ProductName] IS NULL AND [SupplierID] = @SupplierIDAND [SupplierID] IS NULL AND [CategoryID] = @CategoryIDAND [CategoryID] IS NULL AND [QuantityPerUnit] = @QuantityPerUnitAND [QuantityPerUnit] IS NULL AND [UnitPrice] = @UnitPriceAND [UnitPrice] IS NULL AND [UnitsInStock] = @UnitsInStockAND [UnitsInStock] IS NULL AND [UnitsOnOrder] = @UnitsOnOrderAND [UnitsOnOrder] IS NULL AND [ReorderLevel] = @ReorderLevelAND [ReorderLevel] IS NULL AND [Discontinued] = @DiscontinuedAND [Discontinued] IS NULL
